page.title: 07Leisure in Westhill.
page.content: The{golf club}was founded in 1977.The number of people employed is 10 which includes part time employees.The membership for adults is Â£142 per year and for juniors is Â£25.50.There are approximately 750 members.The club house provides a lounge bar which provides meals,a car park,toilets, showers,a shop,pool table,table- tennis,darts and bandit machines.For a non-member it costs Â£4.50 during the week and Â£5.50 at the weekends per round of golf. There are a number of small{play areas some of which have playthings for small children. Most other{leisure facilities}are part of the local schools (both primary and secondary) or are part of the community centre. Westhill Inn offers adults saunas and solarium,as well as food and drink.
